Package com.logicea.cardsapp.integration

Class CardsApplicationIntegrationTests

java.lang.Object
com.logicea.cardsapp.integration.CardsApplicationIntegrationTests
@SpringBootTest @DirtiesContext(classMode=AFTER_EACH_TEST_METHOD) public class CardsApplicationIntegrationTests extends Object
Integration tests for the application. Load and dump the entire Spring Context per each method. Implemented using jUnit4 assertions.
